Articles.Content:
OMG! jeb can you see me?! get out a telescope and look at the edge of the mun!

http://imgur.com/J9Y2BWg
Nice landing site, but technically, it will never rise.
Ya, It is suck like that. I hope your Kerbal wasn't waiting to see the southern part of Kerbin....
The Mun is tidally locked to Kerbin and in a circular orbit perpendicular to both Kerbin and Mun rotation axis, so Kerbin in the Mun sky will never move...
I saw the continent that KSC was on at the time. that's why I did that thing^ + one of my engines blew off at the time
